QuestionTxt: From what you've read and heard, how much of the money the government provided to banks and financial institutions has been paid back...all of the money, most of it, only some of it, or none of it?
SurveySponsor: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press
SourceDoc: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press Political Survey
StudyNote: 900 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 601 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 284 who had no landline telephone.
